title: Citibank Launches Titanium Credit Card with Unique Benefits and Exclusive Services
summary: Cairo – With the MasterCard Titanium Credit Card, the card holder enjoys personalized customer service, and a world of exciting offers. Benefits include unmatched discounts and a vast array of travel, dining, shopping and hotel-related savings along with using the first-class and exclusive lounges in Cairo and Dubai airports.
tag-1: Citibank Launches Titanium Credit Card with Unique Benefits and Exclusive Services
tag-3: Cairo – With the MasterCard Titanium Credit Card, the card holder enjoys personalized customer service, and a world of exciting offers. Benefits include unmatched discounts and a vast array of travel, dining, shopping and hotel-related savings along with using the first-class and exclusive lounges in Cairo and Dubai airports.
tag-4: The new Citibank credit card offers its holder up to 2,000 sign-up bonus points upon the first spend, and the card can earn higher Citi Reward Points for every 1 EGP of purchases, which allows the customer to choose from a range of gifts and purchase vouchers in a selected group of retail outlets in Egypt and across the world, in addition to four complementary supplementary cards.
tag-5: Citibank Titanium Card offers flexible payment on simple premiums ranging between six and 60 months, in addition to insurance services on credit balance and notification services via mobile phones across the city.
tag-6: "We at Citibank seek to provide our customers in the local market with world-class services and the latest innovative banking products. Because cardholders in Egypt are looking to get more privileges that are in line with the requirements of their distinctive lifestyle, we are pleased to offer our clients the Titanium Card with an extensive range of services in travel, shopping and other exclusive benefits, in addition to the developed security level that is characteristic of the new card," said Aftab Ahmed, Country Officer of Citi Egypt.
tag-7: Mr. Ashish Bugara, Citibank Consumer Business Head, commented, "With the launch of the Titanium credit card, Citi renews its commitment towards expanding its banking products and services in Egypt as the new card offers a set of exclusive and innovative payment solutions for clients inside Egypt and abroad. The new credit card is specially designed to meet clients' needs and fast pace in Egypt's growing market."
tag-8: Citibank, was one of the first banks that offered credit cards in the Egyptian market, and for more than 10 years the bank has been developing this line of business. Relying on its expertise and presence in more than 100 countries around the world, the bank has worked on boosting the competitiveness of its credit cards and made it acceptable in 160 countries and more than 21 million outlets around the world. During this period, Citibank has worked on raising awareness of the credit culture as an alternative to cash purchase for its convenience and safety.
tag-9: It should be noted that Citibank has recently launched, in cooperation with Vodafone, a credit card that allows the bank customers to instantly buy all their needs from all Vodafone outlets and pay later in instalments on convenient repayment periods. This card sets a new standard for the current concept of payment by instalments in Egypt. The cooperation with Vodafone will extend to include the new card whereby Vodafone Titanium card customers will be able to gain double points, and even higher when paid through CitiPhone or CBOL
tag-10: Citi Citi, the leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Through Citicorp and Citi Holdings, Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management. Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com.
